author: rooneg
msg: Fix issue number 1800 by making our failure to check out a URL that refers
to a file a bit nicer to the user.  Where previously we would error out with
some cryptic message about attempting to create an entry in a non-directory
parent, now we give a nice error indicating that the URL refers to a file
(svn_client__checkout_internal): error out if the URL we are checking out

author: sussman
msg: * ch09.xml:  fix broken 'svn merge' example in reference section.

author: djh
msg: Don't do recursive locking when the property operation
svn_client_proplist): If the operation is not recursive
then use a lock depth of 0.
